rows.label: qev013204_MSG0001
rows.name: Was it you who broke all my little toys?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013204_MSG0002
rows.name:
I go away on an errand for just a moment,
and come back to this? Such nerve.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013204_MSG0003
rows.name:
This is precisely why I told them you BLADE
insects should be eradicated.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013204_JNK0010
rows.name: Query

rows.label: qev013204_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask her who she is.

rows.label: qev013204_JNK0020
rows.name: Fight

rows.label: qev013204_SEL0021
rows.name: Challenge her to battle.

rows.label: qev013204_MSG0004
rows.name:
Hold your tongue! You think filth such as your
kind has the right to address ME?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013204_MSG0005
rows.name:
Aaaaaargh! You make me ill!
I require your immediate death, insect![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013204_MSG0006
rows.name:
Bwa ha ha ha! Really? A little germ like you
thinks to challenge me?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013204_MSG0007
rows.name:
Such arrogance... It makes me ill!
I require your immediate death, insect![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013204_MSG0008
rows.name:
But wait, no... Extermination is too good for
insects such as you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013204_MSG0016
rows.name:
I'll drive a needle through your living body
and make a display of you instead![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013204_MSG0009
rows.name:
Give thanks to fortune, for you have earned
yourself a place in the Tempera collection![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013204_MSG0010
rows.name: Tch... What now?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013204_MSG0011
rows.name:
...A counterstrike? Damn and damn again!
All right, Sister. I'm on my way.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013204_MSG0012
rows.name: It seems our playtime is over. Such a pity...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013204_MSG0013
rows.name:
But know that if you persist in crawling out
of that wretched hive you call a city, I will
personally ensure that you suffer for it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013204_MSG0014
rows.name:
And your end will not be quick. Oh no.
So enjoy living in fear until then![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013204_MSG0015
rows.name:
No nightmare can prepare you for what
I have in store. Farewell, little insect![ST:wait ]
